attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2005, Jane's Police Review revealed that 21,845 officers were assaulted by members of the public, equating to an assault every 24 minutes. Police officers have no EFFECTIVE means of protection nor do they carry equipment to take control of a violent situation. By arming our police officers we not only give them the protection they so desperately need but we strengthen their ability to do the job.
